extendedInfo.description: * Crazy police chasing game * Boost your chasing car to maximum power * Collect stolen goods, avoid obstacles and boost your car to maximum strength With this amazing street racing game, you can race through the streets of danger, avoiding obstacles, collecting bounty, and upgrading your car to the maximum. Go from police scooter to police car, to helicopter, fire truck and power truck! Have fun with this entertaining game!Adventurous Police Chasing â Auto Car Racing on the Streets of DangerRace,racer,game,about,to,i,fbi,kids,drag,force,army,play,street,rally,academy,chase
